scripts.say: A humanoid Siren is coming our way!
Oh, I know her all right! I've got a bomb with her name on it!
Once this enemy has been dealt with, we'll finally have some time to rest.
...Huh? What's that light coming from the Siren?!
Oh crap! Look out, Commander!
The Siren's weapon glowed. Its sights are aimed at me.
You shall harm NO ONE!
A burst of entwining flame and electricity rushed towards me. South Dakota rushed in front, blocking the attack with her shield.
That was close, it nearly hit the Commander... Pamiat, are you okay?
Oww... I'm fine, minus the back pain...
It seems Pamiat Merkuria, too, tried to protect me from the Siren's attack.
South Dakota looks like she took the hit well, but had it hit Pamiat instead, she could have suffered major damage...
Oh, and I'm expecting a "thank you" later, got it?
You deserve my thanks as well. Had you not alerted me to it, I wouldn't have been able to block it so well.
What did I miss? Oh gosh, are you okay, South Dakota?!
My rigging took only minor damage, but my radar and fire control are malfunctioning. I'd be hard-pressed to fight in my current state...
Malfunctioning?! Have the Sirens pulled out a new weapon on us?!
It would seem so. I was never expecting to encounter a weapon that targets our electronics, not in these waters...
This about confirms that the Sirens in the Bering Sea are not like what we've fought before.

options.content: South Dakota, I want you to fall back for now.

scripts.say: This about confirms that the Sirens in the Bering Sea are not like what we've fought before.

options.content: Everyone, steer clear of this new weapon at all costs!
